title: Happy Little Things
description: Happy Little Thingsวันที่ 11 - 27 ธันวาคม 2567ณ 333Gallery, Warehouse 30Happiness shapes our lives - our thoughts, health, and the way we experience the world. Yet, as we grow older, the joy that seemed so effortless in childhood can feel increasingly out of reach. In today’s fast-paced world, finding happiness amidst the challenges of life can be daunting.This exhibition, "Happy Little Things", explores the beauty of small joys and their power to restore balance and meaning in our lives. Through the character of “Nini,” a little girl representing the innocence and wonder of youth, NSR (Nisra Sobhanasiri) invites you on a journey to rediscover happiness in life’s simplest pleasures.Each artwork serves as a window into undiscovered worlds, filled with stories, companions, and moments that warm the heart. Join us in this artistic adventure as we celebrate the meaningful details of everyday life.Opening RecepSaturday, December 14, 2024, 18:00–20:30
